import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import {useEffect} from "react" import Particle from './Particle.js'; import "./text.css" import aos from 'aos' import './App.css'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css' import { HashLink as Link } from 'react-router-hash-link'; import {BrowserRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; function Text(){ useEffect(()=>{ aos.init({duration:1000}) },[]) return( <>

i'm jarapla  Pavithra Pawar

Fullstack Developer

) } export default Text
